citeinfo.origin: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)
citeinfo.title: PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB: The Public Land Survey System of the Cadastral National Spatial Data Infrastructure for Indiana (Bureau of Land Management, 1:24,000, Esri File Geodatabase)

pubinfo.publish: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM) (Eastern States Office)

citeinfo.othercit: This dataset was provided to IGS personnel on June 11, 2014 in an ESRI File Geodatabase format, and was originally named "IN_CadNSDI_V2.GDB." It was obtained from personnel of the Indiana Office of Technology and contractors for the Bureau of Land Management.

descript.abstract:
PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB is is an Esri file geodatabse of the Public Land Survery System (PLSS) for Indiana, as provided by personnel of the Bureau of Land Management (BLM). The Cadastral National Spatial Data Infrastructure (CadNSDI) Survey Program of the BLM provides the official boundary surveys of all federal-interest lands in the United States, which is over 700 million acres, nationwide. The PLSS is the foundation for many survey-based geographic information systems.
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by the BLM for the source file geodatabase named named "IN_CadNSDI_V2.GDB":
"The CADNSDI or the Cadastral Publication Data Standard is the cadastral data component of the NSDI. This is the publication guideline for cadastral data that is intended to provide a common format and structure and content for cadastral information that can be made available across jurisdictional boundaries, providing a consistent and uniform cadastral data to meet business need that includes connections to the source information from the data stewards. The data stewards determine which data are published and should be contacted for any questions on data content or for additional information. The cadastral publication data is data provided by cadastral data producers in a standard form on a regular basis. Cadastral publication data has two primary components, land parcel data and cadastral reference data. It is important to recognize that the publication data are not the same as the operation and maintenance or production data. The production data is structured to optimize maintenance processes, is integrated with internal agency operations and contains much more detail than the publication data. The publication data is a subset of the more complete production data and is reformatted to meet a national standard so data can be integrated across jurisdictional boundaries and be presented in a consistent and standard form nationally."
descript.purpose:
PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB was produced to create a seemless version of the Public Land Survery System, at the federal level. The BLM reformatted PLSS data supplied by the Indiana Geological Survey to meet a national standard of data that can be integrated across jurisdictional boundaries. The Esri file geodatabase structure of PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB is representative of the BLM standardization of the PLSS for the entire country, and is considered the official boundary of all federal-interest lands in the United States.
The following is excerpted from the metadata provided by the BLM for the source file geodatabase named named "IN_CadNSDI_V2.GDB":
"This data set represents the GIS Version of the Public Land Survey System including both rectangular and non-rectangular surveys. The metadata describes the lineage, sources and production methods for the data content. The definitions and structure of this data is compliant with FGDC Cadastral Data Content Standards and Guidelines for publication.
"This data set is optimized for data publication and sharing rather than for specific "production" or operation and maintenance. This data set includes the following: PLSS Fully Intersected (all of the PLSS feature at the atomic or smallest polygon level), PLSS Townships, First Divisions and Second Divisions (the hierarchical break down of the PLSS Rectangular surveys) PLSS Special surveys (non rectangular components of the PLSS) Meandered Water, Corners and Conflicted Areas (known areas of gaps or overlaps between Townships or state boundaries). The Entity-Attribute section of this metadata describes these components in greater detail.
"This data set was derived from a predecessor coverage named "IN_LANDSURVEY." IN_LANDSURVEY is a digital representation of land survey features as represented on the USGS 1:24,000 digital raster graphic (DRG) series."
descript.supplinf:
PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB was produced to create a seemless version of the Public Land Survery System (PLSS) at the federal level. The BLM reformatted PLSS data supplied by the Indiana Geological Survey to meet a national standard of data that can be integrated across jurisdictional boundaries. It contains three feature datasets named "CadastralReference," "CadastralReferenceLocal," and "Parcels." "CadastralReferenceLocal" and "Parcels" feature datasets contain no data but are retained in order to replicate the Esri file geodatabase data structure at the federal level at the request of BLM personnel.
The feature dataset named "CadastralReference" contains ten file geodatabase feature classes named "ConflictedAreas," "MeanderedWater," "MetadataGlance," "PLSSFirstDivision," "PLSSIntersected," "PLSSPoint," "PLSSSecondDivision," "PLSSSpecialSurvey," "PLSSTownship," and "SurveySystem." Of these ten, the following feature datasets contain no data but are retained in order to replicate the Esri file geodatabase data structure at the federal level at the request of BLM personnel: "ConflictedAreas," "PLSSPoint," "PLSSSecondDivision," and "PLSSSpecialSurvey."

idinfo.native: ESRI ArcGIS version 10.2 file geodatabase format, approximately 36.4 Mb

attracc.attraccr: All information contained in this file geodatabase was supplied by personnel of the BLM and is assumed to be accurate.

dataqual.logic: Data were supplied by personnel of the BLM and logical consistency is assumed to have been checked before official version was released.
dataqual.complete: All information contained in this file geodatabase was supplied by personnel of the BLM and is assumed to be complete.

horizpa.horizpar: Accuracy is no better than that of the source shapefiles used to build PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB. The vector lines contained in the source shapefiles were corrected to DRG raster lines at an on-screen scale of 1:5,000 or better by IGS personnel.

vertacc.vertaccr: Vertical accuracy was not a factor in the digital production of the data set.

citeinfo.origin: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)
citeinfo.title: IN_CadNSDI_V2.GDB (BLMs official release of PLSS data for Indiana, Esri File Geodatabase)

pubinfo.publish: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

srcinfo.srccontr: BLMs official release of PLSS data for Indiana, Esri File Geodatabase

procstep.procdesc: An Esri file geodatabase named "IN_CadNSDI_V2.GDB" was provided to the Indiana Geological Survey (IGS) from BLM personnel on June 9, 2014. It was then reprojected to UTM Zone 16 coordinate system, and NAD 1983 vertical datum using Esri ArcCatalog. It was then renamed to "PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB" in order to conform to the naming conventions of the IGS.

This metadata was pre-parsed and parsed using CNS (Chew and Spit, v 2.6.1) and MP (Metadata Parser, v 2.7.1) software written by Peter N. Schweitzer (United States Geological Survey). The errors generated by MP were all addressed and corrected, except that no values were assigned to "Abscissa_Resolution" and "Ordinate_Resolution."

enttyp.enttypd: Esri File Geodatabase [contains attribute definitions for the following geodatabase feature classes: MeanderedWater (1 record), MetadataGlance (1105 records), PLSSFirstDivision (36,325 records), PLSSIntersected (36,490 records), PLSSTownship (1104 records), and SurveySystem (1321 records)]

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYP, Alias is "Survey Type Code" (MeanderedWater feature class)
attr.attrdef: The survey types from the BLM GCDB, for this feature class the value should be "W" for Water
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYPTXT, Alias is "Survey Type Text" (MeanderedWater feature class)
attr.attrdef: The survey type description, for this feature class the value is "Lake Michigan."
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Length (MeanderedWater feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the length of each polygon perimeter (Units are kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Area (MeanderedWater feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the area of each polygon perimeter (Units are square kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PLSSID, Alias is "Township Identifier" (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: The concatenation of the principal meridian, township, range, and duplication code that form a unique ID value
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPLAB, Alias is "Township Label" (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: The township and range label that is used for cartographic output or web display
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STEWARD, Alias is "Data Steward" (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: Text description of the data steward for Indiana PLSS data ("State of Indiana")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: REVISEDDATE, Alias is "Revised Date" (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: Date of last revision by the data steward for Indiana PLSS data ("7/1/2013")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STATEABBR, Alias is "State Abbreviation" (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: Two digit postal abbreviation of the State these data describe ("IN")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STWRDPLYID (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: A unique identifier for the stewardship polygon features (contains only "Null" values)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STWRDPLYTP, Alias is "Stewardship Polygon Type" (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: The type of polygon for the metadata at a glance. (Examples include "PLSS Township," "Survery Township," "County," or "City.")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STWRDLAB, Alias is "Stewardship Label" (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: Cartographi label for the stewardship polygon (contains only "Null" values)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Length (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the length of each polygon perimeter (Units are kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Area (MetadataGlance feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the area of each polygon perimeter (Units are square kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PLSSID, Alias is "Township Identifier" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: The concatenation of the principal meridian, township, range, and duplication code that form a unique ID value for the township
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVID, Alias is "First Division Identifier" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: Unique identifier for the first division that is built by appending the first division elements on hte township identifier
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVTYP, Alias is "First Division Type Code" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a two character coded value for the type of first division, commonly a section, but may be a lot, parcel, tract or other division ("SN")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVTXT, Alias is "First Division Type Text" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: The first division typoe as a text field ("section")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVNO, Alias is "First Division Number" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a number, letter, or designator for the type of first division, commonly a section, of the PLSS Township (Section numbers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVDUP, Alias is "First Division Duplicate" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a coded value to indicate whether the first division is a duplicated area or identifier ("0")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVLAB, Alias is "First Division Label" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: The label for the first division that is used for cartographic or web display purposes
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYP, Alias is "Survey Type Code" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: Code for the type of special survey typically from the codes for the BLM data collection - used in this feature to indicate if the feature is unsurveyed or unprotracted
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYPTXT, Alias is "Survey Type Text" (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: The description of the survey type code - may be a description of the survey type, or survey status in the case of this feature, without a code
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Length (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the length of each polygon perimeter (Units are kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Area (PLSSFirstDivision feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the area of each polygon perimeter (Units are square kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STATEABBR, Alias is "State Abbreviation" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Two digit postal abbreviation of the State these data describe ("IN")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PRINMERCD, Alias is "Principal Meridian Code" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Principal meridian code value from the BLM PM Code list ("1" or "2")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PRINMER, Alias is "Principal Meridian Text" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Text description of the Principal meridian code value from the BLM PM Code list ("1st Meridian" or "2nd Meridian")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPNO, Alias is "Township Number" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Township number - indicates the number of rows of townships, north or south from a Public Land Survey System Origin ("1st Meridian" or "2nd Meridian")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPFRAC, Alias is "Township Fraction" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Township fraction - created when there are gaps between surveyed Townships, or due to excess size in Townships that arose from executing original surveys
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPDIR, Alias is "Township Direction" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Township direction - direction of a row of Townships from a Public Land Survey System Origin ("N" for North, "S" for South)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RANGENO, Alias is "Range Number" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Range number - indicates the number of columns of townships, east or west from a Public Land Survey System Origin
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RANGEFRAC, Alias is "Range Fraction" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Range fraction - created when there are gaps between surveyed Townships, or due to excess size in Townships that arose from executing original surveys
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RANGEDIR, Alias is "Range Direction" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Range direction - direction of a column of Townships from a Public Land Survey System Origin ("E" for East, "W" for West)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPDPCD, Alias is "Township Duplicate" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: If there are multiple townships in a Public Land Survey System Origin, State and Survey Name, the Township Duplicate Status is used to establish uniqueness. (When more than one Public Land Survey System Township has the same Township and Range numbers and directions and fractions, and are in the same State, this attribute is used to distinguish among duplicate values. A is the first duplicate, B the second etc. A 0 in this field indicates no duplicate).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PLSSID, Alias is "Township Identifier" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The concatenation of the principal meridian, township, range, and duplication code that form a unique ID value for the township
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STEWARD, Alias is "Data Steward" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Text description of the data steward for Indiana PLSS data ("State of Indiana")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPLAB, Alias is "Township Label" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The township and range label that is used for cartographic output or web display
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVID, Alias is "First Division Identifier" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Unique identifier for the first division that is built by appending the first division elements on the township identifier
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVTYP, Alias is "First Division Type Code" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a two character coded value for the type of first division, commonly a section, but may be a lot, parcel, tract or other division ("SN")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVTXT, Alias is "First Division Type Text" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The first division typoe as a text field ("section")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVNO, Alias is "First Division Number" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a number, letter, or designator for the type of first division, commonly a section, of the PLSS Township (Section numbers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVDUP, Alias is "First Division Duplicate" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a coded value to indicate whether the first division is a duplicated area or identifier ("0")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FRSTDIVLAB, Alias is "First Division Label" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The label for the first division that is used for cartographic or web display purposes
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SECDIVID, Alias is "Second Division Identifier" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Unique identifier for the second division (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SECDIVTYP, Alias is "Second Division Type Code" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a two character coded value for the type of Second division (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SECDIVTXT, Alias is "Second Division Type Text" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The Second division type as a text field (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SECDIVNO, Alias is "Second Division Number" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is a number, letter, or designator for the type of Second division (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SECDIVSUF, Alias is "Second Division Suffix" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Second division suffix used to identify duplicates or suffix to the name (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SECDIVNOTE, Alias is "Second Division Note" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Notes about the second division of the PLSS (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SECDIVLAB, Alias is "Second Division Label" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The label for the second division that is used for cartographic or web display purposesn (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVID, Alias is "Survey Identifier" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Unique identifier for a PLSS Special Survey feature ("SEC" for all values in Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYP, Alias is "Survey Type Code" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Coded value of the type of special survey (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYPTXT, Alias is "Survey Type Text" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Text description for the type of special survey ("Section" for all values in Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SRVNAME, Alias is "Survey Name for PLSS Areas" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: A common or otherwise recognized name for a portion of area of a PLSS Survey, for example the refugee lands in Ohio or in cases where a PLSS Township has a recognized name (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVNO, Alias is "Survey Number" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Special survey number or designator for non-rectangular PLSS areas (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVSUF, Alias is "Survey Suffix" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Special survey suffix designation that makes the identification of the area unique (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVNOTE, Alias is "Survey Note" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Notes about the polygon feature that are important for using or understanding the feature. For example from the BLM Survey Notes are A = Approximate Acreage, C = Conflict or Questionable, D = Non-added Acreage
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVDIV, Alias is "Special Survey Division" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The name or designation for any division of a PLSS Special Survey such as Lot in a Tract (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVLAB, Alias is "Survey Label" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Label that is used for cartographic output or web display (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: QSEC, Alias is "Quarter Section" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Quarter section identifer, a two letter label (NE,SE,SW,SE) (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: QQSEC, Alias is "Quarter Quarter Section" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: This is the quarter quarter PLSS reference (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: GOVLOT, Alias is "Government Lot Number" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Government Lot numbers or identifiers (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SOURCEREF, Alias is "Source Doc Link or Reference" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The reference to the source document could be a reference to a map or plat or a deed, also could include document type (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SOURCEDATE, Alias is "Source Doc Date" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The date of the source document (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RECRDAREATX, Alias is "Record Area Test" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The record or recorded area as a text field, may include the units of area (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RECRDAREANO, Alias is "Record Area Number" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The record or recorded area as a numeric field (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RECRDAREANO, Alias is "GIS Area Acres" (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: The area of the feature in acres - computed from the GIS, this is not the record area (Units in Acres)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Length (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the length of each polygon perimeter (Units are kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Area (PLSSIntersected feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the area of each polygon perimeter (Units are square kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: STATEABBR, Alias is "State Abbreviation" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Two digit postal abbreviation of the State these data describe ("IN")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PRINMERCD, Alias is "Principal Meridian Code" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Principal meridian code value from the BLM PM Code list ("1" or "2")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PRINMER, Alias is "Principal Meridian Text" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Text description of the Principal meridian code value from the BLM PM Code list ("1st Meridian" or "2nd Meridian")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPNO, Alias is "Township Number" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Township number - indicates the number of rows of townships, north or south from a Public Land Survey System Origin ("1st Meridian" or "2nd Meridian")
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPFRAC, Alias is "Township Fraction" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Township fraction - created when there are gaps between surveyed Townships, or due to excess size in Townships that arose from executing original surveys
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPDIR, Alias is "Township Direction" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Township direction - direction of a row of Townships from a Public Land Survey System Origin ("N" for North, "S" for South)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RANGENO, Alias is "Range Number" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Range number - indicates the number of columns of townships, east or west from a Public Land Survey System Origin
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RANGEFRAC, Alias is "Range Fraction" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Range fraction - created when there are gaps between surveyed Townships, or due to excess size in Townships that arose from executing original surveys
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: RANGEDIR, Alias is "Range Direction" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Range direction - direction of a column of Townships from a Public Land Survey System Origin ("E" for East, "W" for West)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPDPCD, Alias is "Township Duplicate" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: If there are multiple townships in a Public Land Survey System Origin, State and Survey Name, the Township Duplicate Status is used to establish uniqueness. (When more than one Public Land Survey System Township has the same Township and Range numbers and directions and fractions, and are in the same State, this attribute is used to distinguish among duplicate values. A is the first duplicate, B the second etc. A 0 in this field indicates no duplicate).
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: PLSSID, Alias is "Township Identifier" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: The concatenation of the principal meridian, township, range, and duplication code that form a unique ID value for the township
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: TWNSHPLAB, Alias is "Township Label" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: The township and range label that is used for cartographic output or web display
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SRVNAME, Alias is "Survey Name for PLSS Areas" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: A common or otherwise recognized name for a portion of area of a PLSS Survey, for example the refugee lands in Ohio or in cases where a PLSS Township has a recognized name (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYP, Alias is "Survey Type Code" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Coded value of the type of special survey (No data values for Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVTYPTXT, Alias is "Survey Type Text" (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Text description for the type of special survey ("Section" for all values in Indiana)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Length (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the length of each polygon perimeter (Units are kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Area (PLSSTownship feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the area of each polygon perimeter (Units are square kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVSYSID, Alias is "Survey System ID" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: The primary key or identifier for Survey System Area
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVSYSTYPE, Alias is "Survey System Type" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Survey System Type indicates the category or major class of the description
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVSYSNM, Alias is "Survey System Name" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: The Survey System Name - identifying name or number for a specific type of Survey System area
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVSYSTYPE, Alias is "Survey System Code" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Contains any codes or indices for tracking or managing the survey system areas
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SURVSYSNM, Alias is "Survey System Note" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Contains any notes on the use, name or application of the survey system area
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FIRSTDIVID, Alias is "Surv Sys First Division ID" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: The Survey System First Division primary key or identifier
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FIRSTDIVTYPE, Alias is "Surv Sys First Division Type" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Describes the classification of the First Division of the Survey System, this is not the same as the PLSS First Division
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: FIRSTDIVNM, Alias is "Surv Sys First Division Name" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: An alpha, numeric, or alpha-numeric designator used to identify the First Division of the Survey System
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SCNDIVID, Alias is "Surv Sys Second Division ID" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: The Survey System Second Division primary key or identifier
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SCNDIVTYPE, Alias is "Surv Sys Second Division Type" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Describes the classification of the Second Division of the Survey System, this is not the same as the PLSS Second Division
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SCNDIVNM, Alias is "Surv Sys Second Division Name" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: The Survey System Third Division name or number
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: THRDIVID, Alias is "Surv Sys Third Div ID" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: The primary key or identifier for the Survey System third division
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: THRDIVTYPE, Alias is "Surv Sys Third Div Type" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Describes the classification of the Third Division of the Survey System, this is not the same as the PLSS Third Division
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: THRDIVNM, Alias is "Surv Sys Third Div Name" (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: TheThird Division Type describes the classification of the Survey System Third Division
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Length (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the length of each polygon perimeter (Units are kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

attr.attrlabl: SHAPE_Area (SurveySystem feature class)
attr.attrdef: Software computed measurement of the area of each polygon perimeter (Units are square kilometers)
attr.attrdefs: U.S. Department of the Interior - Bureau of Land Management (BLM)

distinfo.distliab:
CREDIT:
It is requested that the Indiana Geological Survey be cited in any products generated from this data. The following source citation should be included: [PLSS_CadNSDI_BLM_IN.GDB: The Public Land Survey System of the Cadastral National Spatial Data Infrastructure for Indiana (Bureau of Land Management, 1:24,000, Esri File Geodatabase)].
WARRANTY:
Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey warrants that the media on which this product is stored will be free from defect in materials and workmanship for ninety (90) days from the date of acquisition. If such a defect is found, return the media to Publication Sales, Indiana Geological Survey, 611 North Walnut Grove, Bloomington, Indiana 47405 2208, and it will be replaced free of charge.
LIMITATION OF WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY:
Except for the expressed warranty above, the product is provided "AS IS", without any other warranties or conditions, expressed or implied, including, but not limited to, warranties for product quality, or suitability to a particular purpose or use. The risk or liability resulting from the use of this product is assumed by the user. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey shares no liability with product users indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, loss of revenue or profit, lost or damaged data or other commercial or economic loss. Indiana University, Indiana Geological Survey is not responsible for claims by a third party. The maximum aggregate liability to the original purchaser shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the product.

metainfo.metuc: This metadata file is intended to accompany the data set identified and received from the IGS. It is not to be altered or summarized. IGS does not support secondary distribution. If this data set was received from anyone besides the IGS, this metadata file and the data set it describes may lack integrity.
